description:
The story of the anime will revolve around Dreamcast, Sega Saturn, and Mega Drive, who have just enrolled in SeHaGaga Academy at Tokyo`s Haneda Ootorii station. They are given an assignment needed to graduate by a suspicious teacher, and to clear this assignment, the girls need to enter the world of Sega games. The girls must try their best to graduate without incident.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
In Haneda, Tokyo, next to Ootori, lies Sehegaga Academy.  Dreamcast, Mega Drive, and Sega Saturn are students there.  To get the credits they need to graduate, they have to go inside video games and complete tasks there.  Their first task is to go inside Virtua Fighter...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`ll Always Be 10 Years Too Early for You!
Itsudatte 10 Nen Hayain Da yo!
いつだって10年早いんだよ!

REGULAR.description:
Dreamcast, Mega Drive, and Saturn are students at Sehagaga Academy.  They`ve come inside the world of virtua fighter, but to get the credit medals they need to graduate, they must win 100 fights in a row.  They start off against powerful foes like Akira and Jeffry, and then are forced to fight characters from other games entirely, like Flicky and Mushi King.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Combo de Tsunage Atsui Kimochi
Connect Your Passions into a Combo
コンボでつなげ 熱い気持ち

REGULAR.description:
Dreamcast, Mega Drive, and Saturn thought graduating Sehagaga academy would be easy, but they`re finding it a lot harder than they thought.  When Mega Drive finds out the next game is "Space Channel 5", she gets very sad.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Up, Down, Left, Right, Tama ni Naname Ue
Up, Down, Left, Right, and Occasionlly Up Diagonal
アップ, ダウン, レフト, ライト, たまにナナメ上

REGULAR.description:
Dreamcast, Saturn, and Mega Drive have come inside the world of Space Channel 5 to get the credits they need to graduate.  They challenge aliens to dance battles with Ulala to save Center-sensei`s friends.  But not only do they have to save them, they have to earn view ratings too.  Saturn strips down to her bathing suit to help earn ratings, but things take an unexpected twist thanks to Center-sensei`s friends.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Seha Girl Space Channel 5 Odotte Mita
Seha Girls: We Tried to Dance Space Channel 5
【セハガール】スペースチャンネル5【踊ってみた】

REGULAR.description:
Dreamcast, Saturn, and Mega Drive must complete tasks to earn credit medals.  But this time they don`t have to go inside a game.  Their task now is to use Puyopuyo to create a new game.  And anybody who comes up with a stupid idea will lose medals. Saturn and Mega Drive think hard, but Dreamcast is the first to raise her hand...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Puyo + Puyo + Puyo + Puyo = 0
Puyo to Puyo to Puyo to Puyo wa Zero
ぷよ+ぷよ+ぷよ+ぷよ=0

REGULAR.description:
Just as the group is about to get used to the strange class, it`s time for their Center Exam.  They`ll be going into the world of "Border Break" and piloting Blast Runners in an attempt to destroy the enemy`s core.  Since this exam is important, they`ll be getting far more medals than usual.  But during the exam, Center-sensei has an emergency message.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Center-sensei no Center Shiken
Center-sensei`s Center Exam
センター先生のセンター試験

REGULAR.description:
In the middle of their Center exam, Dr. Eggman suddenly takes over the system and locks them inside the world of Border Break.  Their Blast Runners are stolen and they`re shrunk to miniature size.  But Sonic arrives at the speed of light to save them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eggman vs. Sonic with Sega Hard Girls
Eggman vs. Sonic with the Sega Hard Girls
エッグマンvsソニックwithセガ・ハード・ガールズ

REGULAR.description:
It`s almost time for the next Sehagaga Academy culture fair.  Everyone is told to participate in an event, and everybody has their own idea of what to do.  Part of the fair is a beauty contest, and so they start looking at their rivals.  The three of them look at the profiles, and they`re all very strange people...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kagayake! Dai 54 Kai! Nouten Chokugeki! Porori wa Nai Kedo Porori Seishun Genkai no Barrier o Uchiyabure! Sehagaga Gakuen Bunkasai!
Shine! Episode 54! Shock to the Brain! No Boobs, but We`ll Destroy the Barriers of Boob-obsessed Youth! Sehagaga Academy Fair!
輝け!第54回!脳天直撃!ポロリはないけどポロリ青春 限界のバリアを打ち破れ!セハガガ学園文化祭!

REGULAR.description:
This time they`ll be going into Chain Chronicle. The three of them are excited to go into their first RPG, but when they see an entrance that`s different than usual, they`re very upset.  When they get inside the game, they`re attacked by a monster, and have trouble cooperating and fighting back...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Buki Kyouka no Seikouritsu 50%, Taikan de wa 15% Setsu
Weapon Enhancement Succeeds at a 50% Rate, but It Sure Feels Like 15% to Me.
武器強化の成功率50%,体感では15%説

REGULAR.description:
The world of Jet Set Radio is full of tricky tricks on inline skates and graffiti.  Dreamcast, Saturn, and Megadrive have come to this world to race, but instead the decide to go shopping and get their photo taken.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Broken Jet Set Radio
Kowarekake no Jet Set Radio
壊れかけのジェットセットラジオ

REGULAR.description:
The next task for the Sega Hard girls is to go into the world of Shining Force Cross Excelia Zenith wearing costumes from Phantasy Star Online 2.  They look forward to cute outfits, but instead are given Rappy suits.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dream Rappy, Saturn Rappy, Mega Rappy, ?? Rappy
Dream Rappy, Saturn Rappy, Mega Rappy, ?? Rappy
ドリラッピー, サタラッピー, メガラッピー, ??ラッピー

REGULAR.description:
The girls get the medals they need to graduate, but a new enemy, "Black Asobin" appears.  He steals their medals, and invites them to "Black Asobin World" to get them back.  They make their way to his tower there, and find themselves in the Virtua Fighting ring, where they encounter a familiar face.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Heard We`re Graduating Sehaga
Sehaga, Sotsugyou Surundatte yo
セハガ, 卒業するんだってよ

REGULAR.description:
It`s time to graduate.  Dreamcast, Saturn, and Mega Drive have longed for this day.  The ceremony goes off without a hitch, but Center-sensei tells them a shocking fact.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Itsudatte, Tsunagattemasu kara!
We`ll Always Be Connected!
いつだって, つながってますから!
Episode S1
第54回 ハンパじゃノー! 全力でグー! 優勝するのはオンリーユー! すべての学校行事を過去にする! セハガガ学園体育祭
Opening
Ending

WIKIPEDIA_JP: セガ・ハード・ガールズ

titles.title: Hi Scoool! Seha Girl
Hi-sCool! Seha Girls
Hi-sCool! Seha Girls
Hi-sCool! Seha Girls
Hi☆sCoool! セハガール
世嘉硬件女孩
Hi-sCoool! SeHa Girl
Sega Hard Girls
